creator: Casualino Games
descriptionHtml:
PLAY FREE EUCHRE ONLINE! SOCIAL EUCHRE GAME WITH PLAYERS FROM AROUND THE 🌎 Create a custom euchre game and set the Canadian Loner, Stick the dealer, or with Benny rule options!

Join the rapidly growing Euchre game community of players! Text in the Global Chat, exchange tips & find new buddies!

Master the eucher game, win all the tricks with your partner or be a Loner and declare yourself a Euchre pro!


EUCHRE.COM GAME FEATURES

👥 ONLINE ЕUCHRE
Invite friends and family, and play euchre online with your own rules in the “Play with friends” room! Create a custom game, choose the entry, prize, card deck (24 or 32) and many other options that will make the game more exciting!

▶ PLAY LIVE
Start a live euchre game! Choose your level, and get matched with others on the same level as you.

🥇LEADERBOARDS
Conquer the euchre charts! In the "Richest", "Best", "Most Popular" and "Biggest Winner" rankings you’re going to see your new allies and rivals!

🗪 GLOBAL CHAT
Are you ready to exchange some free euchre tips or need small talk? Create chat threads, or comment & like others players' topics!

🏆EUCHRE TOURNAMENTS
Do you like playing Euchre tournaments? Advance your skills, win 3 consecutive games, and get three times your stake.

🔊LIVE, IN-GAME CONVERSATION
Euchre free game with a real-time, in-game chat! Have a chit-chat with your buddies in a custom game!

💯 DAILY BONUSES

Enter Euchre.com and collect free tokens by

- Collecting a daily bonus,
- Spinning the Wheel,
- Watching rewarded videos,
- Inviting a friend via Facebook to play on Euchre.com,
- Adding a login method!


👑 VIP STATUS
Become a VIP member of the community and get access to benefits such as:
- Moderating your chat threads,
- “Like” chat threads,
- Deleting messages and removing players from your chat topics,
- Access to other players' media galleries,
- 15% more tokens on purchases,
- Access to exclusive content and promotions

👤 ONE ACCOUNT
Register and play free euchre at your convenience through a smartphone, tablet or browser.

📝 DAILY CHALLENGES
We have more prizes prepared! Complete 2 euchre online challenges in 24 hours and collect a reward!

✏ TAILOR YOUR PROFILE
Add an avatar, present yourself through a short bio, choose from a wide variety of frames and change the table background where you're playing at.

The game is known as Euker, Eucre, Yuker, Eucha, Yuker, Uker, etc.

=== THE RULES OF EUCHRE ===

Euchre is a trick-taking card game played by two fixed teams two. The game is played with a 24, ranked J (of trump suit), J (same color as trump suit), A, K, Q, 10, and 9 or 32 card deck (including 7 and 8s), where the Joker (Benny) can be additionally added. The cards are distributed as follows: each player receives 5 cards, and the remaining 4 cards form the kitty. The game begins when the top card of the kitty is turned up and the bidding begins. Each player can choose whether he like the suit of the top card to be trump by responding “pick it up” or “pass”. If the dealer picks up the card, the dealer then discards the card to the kitty, face down.

When a trump suit is selected, the J in the suit of the same colour becomes a member of this trump suit. Any card of the trump suit outranks any card of a non-trump suit. With naming a suit, each team's intentions are to win the majority of the tricks. Suppose a bid succeeds the team scores one point. If a team wins all five tricks, he makes a “march”. Failure to win three tricks is referred to as being “euchered”.

Euchre.com is the classic, free Eucher game, but for a better experience, we offer in-app, paid options.

SHARE YOUR THOUGHTS WITH US

Have questions, feedback or suggestions?
Contact us at: support@euchre.com

IMPORTANT:
This product is intended for use by those 18 or older and is for amusement purposes only. This game includes in-app purchases. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling and gaming.

4.20.1.53

creator: Casualino Games
descriptionHtml:
PLAY FREE EUCHRE ONLINE! SOCIAL EUCHRE GAME WITH PLAYERS FROM AROUND THE 🌎 Create a custom euchre game and set the Canadian Loner, Stick the dealer, or with Benny rule options!

EUCHRE.COM GAME FEATURES

👥 ONLINE ЕUCHRE
Invite friends and family, and play euchre online with your own rules in the “Play with friends” room! Create a custom game, choose the entry, prize, card deck (24 or 32) and many other options that will make the game more exciting!

▶ PLAY LIVE
Start a live euchre game! Choose your level, and get matched with others on the same level as you.

🥇LEADERBOARDS
Conquer the euchre charts! In the "Richest", "Best", "Most Popular" and "Biggest Winner" rankings you’re going to see your new allies and rivals!

🗪 GLOBAL CHAT
Are you ready to exchange some free euchre tips or need small talk? Create chat threads, or comment & like others players' topics!

🏆EUCHRE TOURNAMENTS
Do you like playing Euchre tournaments? Advance your skills, win 3 consecutive games, and get three times your stake.

🔊LIVE, IN-GAME CONVERSATION
Euchre free game with a real-time, in-game chat! Have a chit-chat with your buddies in a custom game!

💯 DAILY BONUSES

Enter Euchre.com and collect free tokens by

- Collecting a daily bonus,
- Spinning the Wheel,
- Watching rewarded videos,
- Inviting a friend via Facebook to play on Euchre.com,
- Adding a login method!

Enjoy an exclusive bonus with Purchase stamps, where you will receive additional chips after 5 in-app purchases at any price (one stamp is a present from us). Also, additional bonuses with manual level up.

👑 VIP STATUS
Become a VIP member of the community and get access to benefits such as:
- Moderating your chat threads,
- “Like” chat threads,
- Deleting messages and removing players from your chat topics,
- Access to other players' media galleries,
- 15% more tokens on purchases,
- Access to exclusive content and promotions

👤 ONE ACCOUNT
Register and play free euchre at your convenience through a smartphone, tablet or browser.

📝 DAILY CHALLENGES
We have more prizes prepared! Complete 2 euchre online challenges in 24 hours and collect a reward!

✏ TAILOR YOUR PROFILE
Add an avatar, present yourself through a short bio, choose from a wide variety of frames and change the table background where you're playing at.

The game is known as Euker, Eucre, Yuker, Eucha, Yuker, Uker, etc.

=== THE RULES OF EUCHRE ===

Euchre is a trick-taking card game played by two fixed teams two. The game is played with a 24, ranked J (of trump suit), J (same color as trump suit), A, K, Q, 10, and 9 or 32 card deck (including 7 and 8s), where the Joker (Benny) can be additionally added. The cards are distributed as follows: each player receives 5 cards, and the remaining 4 cards form the kitty. The game begins when the top card of the kitty is turned up and the bidding begins. Each player can choose whether he like the suit of the top card to be trump by responding “pick it up” or “pass”. If the dealer picks up the card, the dealer then discards the card to the kitty, face down.

When a trump suit is selected, the J in the suit of the same colour becomes a member of this trump suit. Any card of the trump suit outranks any card of a non-trump suit. With naming a suit, each team's intentions are to win the majority of the tricks. Suppose a bid succeeds the team scores one point. If a team wins all five tricks, he makes a “march”. Failure to win three tricks is referred to as being “euchered”.

Euchre.com is the classic, free Eucher game, but for a better experience, we offer in-app, paid options.

SHARE YOUR THOUGHTS WITH US

Have questions, feedback or suggestions?
Contact us at: support@euchre.com

IMPORTANT:
This product is intended for use by those 18 or older and is for amusement purposes only. This game includes in-app purchases. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling and gaming.

The game is known as Euker, Eucre, Yuker, Eucha, Yuker, Uker, etc.

=== THE RULES OF EUCHRE ===

Euchre is a trick-taking card game played by two fixed teams two. The game is played with a 24, ranked J (of trump suit), J (same color as trump suit), A, K, Q, 10, and 9 or 32 card deck (including 7 and 8s), where the Joker (Benny) can be additionally added. The cards are distributed as follows: each player receives 5 cards, and the remaining 4 cards form the kitty. The game begins when the top card of the kitty is turned up and the bidding begins. Each player can choose whether he like the suit of the top card to be trump by responding “pick it up” or “pass”. If the dealer picks up the card, the dealer then discards the card to the kitty, face down.

When a trump suit is selected, the J in the suit of the same colour becomes a member of this trump suit. Any card of the trump suit outranks any card of a non-trump suit. With naming a suit, each team's intentions are to win the majority of the tricks. Suppose a bid succeeds the team scores one point. If a team wins all five tricks, he makes a “march”. Failure to win three tricks is referred to as being “euchered”.
